text:
@realDonaldTrump for first time i would say you are correct ! alot of media trying exaggerate  about #coronavirus  but the truth is : 
✅less then 3% death rate 
✅almost 60% of patients fully recovered 
✅ #flu killed more then 90,000 from the beginning if 2020  worldwide . https://t.co/WdoXtFysq1
